Grouping of list content
By using the Menu Items within the Listbox, items can be divided
Bedroom into different groups. Group headers are used to differentiate
between categories.

Listbox container
The Listbox component is a container and therefore does not
have any states.

Inherited states
When Menu Items or List View Items are added inside the Listbox, these components
are able to take on any of their available states. When using the List View Item, it will
inherit another hover state connected to the Listbox.
Lh Title Lh Title
Default Hover
Lh Title v
Selected Disabled
Listbox will inherit the state of the component inside of it.
Behaviours
Selection triggers
Use one of these following components to trigger the
Listbox.
| Select a room v | Combobox + Comboboxes are typically used in forms.
EE « Pill button are typically used to filter products and categories.
* Icon Pills are typically used in contexts when you need to save
space and have a limited number of options to select from.
Select aroom Vv Pill Button
(+) Icon Button
Using Combobox to trigger Listbox
Combobox can be used to trigger a Listbox. When opening the
Listbox, it appears below or above it, populated by a list view with
multiple options.
Countries
Choose country A
Sweden
Netherlands
Spain
Using Pill button to trigger Listbox
Pill buttons can be used to filter products and categories. When
clicking a Pill, the Listbox appears in conjunction to it, populated
by a list view with multiple options.
Metal v
Glass
Textile
Using Icon Pill to trigger Listbox
Icon Pills can be used to trigger a Listbox. When clicking an Icon
Pill, the Listbox appears in conjunction to it, containing a list view
with actions.
Shopping Bag (-)
Always use List View Item instead of Menu Item when creating
lists with actions or navigation.
©; Add a product by article number
Q Add (2) products to wishlist
Ti Empty shopping bag
2; Share these items
Using custom content inside Listbox
The Listbox uses Menu Item by default to support selection. It can
Bedroom Rn . .
be replaced by List View Item or other content if needed. Use List
View Item when creating lists with actions and navigation.
Beds & Bed frames >
m—” Mattresses >
Wardrobes >
S—
|| Bedside tables >
Using Pills for filtering
For filtering, Pill buttons can be used to trigger a Listbox, displaying the different
alternatives. It can also show which items have been selected. When selecting options,
extra small Pill buttons are displayed below the selection Pill group to show which items
have been selected. These are dismissible, making it easier to edit the selection.

Use Listbox to display clear and simple actions
Always aim to show actions up front instead of hiding them in a Listbox. Primary actions
should always be easy to access in the user interface.

Internationalisation
RTL languages
The content inside Listbox, including the icon placement, should
always flip its content horizontally for right-to-left languages.

Keyboard interaction [WIP]
Key Description
Tab In a form, focus on the next field.
Shift + Tab In a form, focus on the previous field.
Arrow up or down When focused, displays the selection menu.
Arrow up or down When the selection menu is displayed, changes which option is focused.
Enter / Space When the selection menu is displayed, changes the select value to the focused option.
